title: The Power Hour - July 11 08 - Bill Hendon (cf)
description:
The Power Hour
July 11, 2008
Bill Hendon

FRIDAY - JULY 11:

Former North Carolina Congressman BILL HENDON returns to TPH to remind VOTERS of the unconscionable abandonment of our American Prisoners-of-War by their ultimate un-American betrayers...many of whom are seeking elected offices today - - - and worse, if elected these people will continue to reward their comrades with key-appointments.

"Former Congressman Hendon has the documented proof on John McCain...and Powell, the Bushes, and Kissinger...and John Kerry...and more...who worked extremely hard to leave Viet Nam POWS LEFT BEHIND. MCCAIN is NO HERO! He is a criminal of the worst degree. It is an Enormous Crime!" - - - Marie Gunther, Guest Producer of TPH

Click Here for maps referenced on pages 415-416 in the book An Enormous Crime (by) Bill Hendon and Elizabeth Stewart -They are very important to any discussion of John McCain&#039;s actions on the committee.

BOOK: An Enormous Crime (by) Bill Hendon and Elizabeth Stewart available at http://www.Enormouscrime.com

Past detail Interview with former Congressman BILL HENDON ARCHIVED at http://www.GCNLive.com 2nd hour of JULY 2, 2007
